name: The Quest to Kill a Dragon 02
name_original: The Quest to Kill a Dragon 02
description:
In this choose your own destiny game, you take on the role of a dude who has made it rich by killing at least one dragon, and now runs an inn.  But his mate, the Mage sends his retirement plans into disarray by getting himself into trouble.

So, in this quest, you find yourself setting out, without a map, once more..   Who knows what you'll find along the way.

With many different outcomes, and few of them good, it's up to your own choices as to whether you encounter a success, or a sticky demise!
